description: Surrogate primary key for the code record, unique within this table; used for joins and referential integrity.
Business code value presented to users and stored in transactions to reference this code.
Human-readable name of the code (e.g., maintenance category, component, or task).
Identifier of the code set this entry belongs to (code list/type); likely a foreign key to a code-type master; confirm with SME.
Optional free-text notes providing additional context about the code.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this record, regardless of who made it.
Likely timestamp captured when a user last modified the record; overlaps with last_modified; confirm with SME.
User account that created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created.
User account that last updated the record.
Timestamp when the record was last updated by a user.
